attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Animal Abuse is happening as we speak all over the world 

It is happening every minute

Around 9,000 animals die each year from animal abuse

(Example; Bears in china are being pierced ,, with a chain attached which the bears are then forced to dance 


Please please help us stop animal abuse


(P.S We are only 10 years old so we are not very descriptive and really really want to stop it
please )

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Animal-Cruelty-/
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
